title: Beneath These Lies
description: From USA Today bestselling author Meghan March comes a riveting new stand-alone novel in the addictive Beneath series. Are you ready to go back to New Orleans? Look, but don’t touch… she might as well wear a neon sign that says it. It just makes me want her more. She might be above me in every way, but I still want her under me.I’ve got no business touching her rich-girl skin, but that won’t stop me from stealing a taste. Because rules were meant to be broken—especially when the prize is so fine.In a world where nothing is as it seems, what's buried beneath these lies?Beneath These Lies is the fifth book in the Beneath series but is easily enjoyed as a stand alone.
author: Meghan March
